wblut.hemesh

Class HEMC_Panelizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HEMC_MultiCreator
      • wblut.hemesh.HEMC_Panelizer

  • public class HEMC_Panelizer
extends HEMC_MultiCreator
    Planar cut of a mesh. Both parts are returned as separate meshes.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
